reviewText: I love all 3 movies. Im proud to own a piece of my history. Definately going to continue to recommend and pass down.
Very funny. The movie was not too heavy. There wasn't a lot of cursing or nudity. Great cast. Lots of laughs.
Great combo of movies. Cheaper that way. These movies are classic old school comedy. I would recommend anyone to buy this combo.
A movie I really liked, it was very funny and enteraining,one of the better dvds with two movies on it.
My two favorite movies in one. These are two great family movies that can be watched on Friday nights. Very funny and entertaining.
This took me back to my childhood.  I love that I got these in a package set.
Great break dancing movies
Save your $$ and get them individually instead , got this set for less than $10.00

Three classic movies for a great price I bought these same three movies years ago for almost $50.00 at frys electronic's I couldn't believe how inexpensive these movies where on Amazon I had to buy them again!!! You can't go wrong with breakin 1+2 and beat street these movies speak to everyone young and old. Very happy with my purchase thank you Amazon once again you delivering quality products at a great price.
Happy with my choice. I loved these movies as a kid so to see all three of them on one dvd this was EPIC for me. :)

Now, I actually bought this set for my dad, he grew up watching these movies and LOVES them. After his divorce he the ex kept both Beat Street and Breakin' so I searched for them on here and decided to buy them as a surprise and early Father's Day gift. He absolutely loved it and watched Breakin' the first night I gave them to him. It also came in a timely manner and had no scratches what so ever. I was very happy with this product.

All great movies, but, as you can imagine, cramming them all on one disc the quality is going to suffer.  I feel like it's more authentic watching them this way, though, it's close to VHS quality.  Well, still better than VHS.

Watching it now as an adult, I can spot some terrible acting but it's just one of those movies I had to share with my kids and I'd watch it again. I only wish people would go back to "dance fighting" even if that meant I'd lose every fight.
